#x ranges are kept, whereas z ranges are ignored (i.e, in this example, and x between 170000 and 190000 is kept, but a z equal to 0 will be removed) 
x 161000 178000 160000 177000 160000 177000 160000 177000 158000 175000
x 271000 288000 270000 287000 270000 287000 270000 287000 268000 285000
x 380000 399000 379000 398000 379000 398000 379000 398000 377000 396000
x 491000 508000 490000 507000 490000 507000 490000 507000 488000 505000
x 601000 618000 600000 617000 600000 617000 600000 617000 599000 616000
z 0 0
#z 4000 inf
